sentences.en: Convene and Preside over the Arbitration Jury.
sentences.cn: 召集及主持仲裁委员会.

sentences.en: Every Monday morning I convene and preside over our department meeting.
sentences.cn: 每个星期一的早上,我召集和主持部门会议.

sentences.en: I am glad to preside at this banquet.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴主持这次宴会.

sentences.en: I shall be pleased to preside at your meetings.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴主持你们的会议。

sentences.en: I was not paid to preside over disasters.
sentences.cn: 我不用对这次失败负责.

sentences.en: It'seems to preside over London like a benevolent.
sentences.cn: 它像仁慈般的神灵主宰着伦敦.

sentences.en: Mr Justice Waller, presiding judge for the northeast
sentences.cn: 沃勒法官，东北地区的首席法官

sentences.en: Mr Smith will preside at the next meeting.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生将主持下一次会议.

sentences.en: Responsibilities: Preside the overall work of Ganyu County.
sentences.cn: 分管工作: 主持赣榆县全面工作.

sentences.en: Some people believe that the Fates preside over man's destiny.
sentences.cn: 有些人相信,命运之神安排人类的命运.

sentences.en: The minister was asked to preside at the independence ceremonies of the small island state.
sentences.cn: 那位部长被邀请去主持这个小岛国的独立仪式.

sentences.en: They asked if I would preside at the committee meeting.
sentences.cn: 他们问我是否会主持委员会会议。

sentences.en: Tom will preside over the ceremony.

sentences.cn: 比赛的评审必须得到世厨协的批准.

sentences.en: Who happened to preside over the economic crisis at the time?
sentences.cn: 当发生经济危机时谁正好在掌权?

sentences.en: Who is to preside over the meeting hasn't been decided.
sentences.cn: 这个会议要谁来主持还未决定.

sentences.en: Who will preside at the meeting?

trans.tran_en: to be in charge of a formal event, organization, ceremony etc

trans.tran_cn: 主持，指挥，担任会议主席
trans.tran_en: to be in charge of a formal event, organization, ceremony etc
